Why are you trying to uninstall glib?: If it has a GUI in Ubuntu it probably needs glib
Open synaptic, search for that package, select it, and hit ctrl-e
Tell it to use the one that ends with '(dapper)'
or dapper-security/dapper-updates if they exist
